entry.title: Ripple Lawyer Argues SEC Chair Gensler Has Prejudged Crypto Asset Cases
entry.summary:
Recently, Gary Gensler, the chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), expressed his opinion in a detailed interview with New York Magazine‚Äôs Intelligencer regarding why he believes crypto assets other than bitcoin are securities. However, Stuart Alderoty, Ripple‚Äôs chief legal officer, argues that Gensler must ‚Äúrecuse himself from voting on any enforcement case that raises that issue.‚Äù Alderoty insists that the SEC chair ‚Äúhas prejudged the outcome.‚Äù
Lawyer Ignites Discussion on Twitter Over SEC Chair‚Äôs Comments on Cryptocurrency and Securities
The recent interview of SEC chair Gary Gensler may have negative implications for the U.S. securities regulator, as he has been accused of publicly discussing his prejudgment of the outcome. Bitcoin.com News recently reported ‚Ä¶

The goal, according to a blog post, is to build ‚Äúa self-custody bitcoin wallet designed to empower the next 100 million people to truly own and manage their money with bitcoin.‚Äù First introduced in 2022, the product principles indicate Block‚Äôs desire to create a wallet that allows users to truly own and manage bitcoin ‚Äúin a way that makes self-custody more accessible than ever before.‚Äù Partners will seemingly be a major part of building the self-custody wallet. ‚ÄúThrough global and local partnerships with exchanges and on/off ramp partners, we provide c‚Ä¶

entry.title: Logium V1: The Simple Way to Profit From Crypto Betting
entry.summary:
Logium, an ambitious newcomer to the world of crypto betting, has recently undergone a noteworthy refresh to better serve its users.
What is Logium?
Logium is a peer-to-peer platform that allows traders to bet with each other on whether the price of an asset will go up or down in value. Every trade on Logium is executed in P2P, with up to 5x leverage. The platform has no access to users‚Äô funds and only withholds a small (up to 5%) fee from the winning side of the bet, adhering to the core DeFi values of decentralization, democratization, and transparency. Importantly, Logium does not charge for bet maintenance. Regardless of the timeframe, leverage, or chosen position. If you are interested in a detailed outlook on Logium, follow them on Twitter.
What were the changes to Logium V1? ‚Ä¶

entry.title: gm: Kristin Smith and the Crypto Crusade in Washington
